title: FS/FT: t206 and t205 HOFers (Johnson, Matty, Collins, and more)
author: jimivintage

posts.post_title: FS/FT: t206 and t205 HOFers (Johnson, Matty, Collins, and more)
posts.post_content:
The following are all available due to them being "bumped" out of my Top Ten Collection thanks to recent pick ups.  Anyone who purchases or trades for them will help in my quest.  Thanks for taking a look!

t206 Johnson Portrait SC150 No. 25 BVG AUT (I believe it will grade PSA 1) = $280
t206 Mathewson Portrait SC150 No.30 PSA 1 = $SOLD!
t206 Wheat RC P350-460 SGC 30 = $115
t206 Beckley P350 SGC 20 = $53


t205 Johnson SC Black No.42 PSA 1 = $SOLD!
t205 Collins (mouth closed) Hassan 30 SGC 40 = $100
t205 Collins (mouth closed) P25 PSA 1 = $47
t205 Brown SC Red No. 42 SGC 20 = $83

Or take them all for $1,125.  Prices include shipping.  I'll add more scans as I can.  Feel free to e-mail me at [url]jimivintage@yahoo.com[/url] with questions.

Thanks!

Jimi
